com.colorful.atom.beans
Class FeedDoc

java.lang.Object
  com.colorful.atom.beans.FeedDoc

public class FeedDoc
extends java.lang.Object

This class reads and writes atom feeds to and from xml files and beans or xml strings.

Author:
Bill Brown

Method Detail

writeFeedDoc

public static void writeFeedDoc(java.lang.String outFile,
                                Feed feed,
                                java.lang.String encoding,
                                java.lang.String version)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
Writes the atom feed to an xml file.

Parameters:
outFile - the path and name of the file to write.
feed - the atom feed bean containing the content of the feed
encoding - the file encoding (default is utf-8)
version - the xml version (default is 1.0)
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - thrown if the feed cannot be written to the outFile

readFeedToString

public static java.lang.String readFeedToString(java.io.File file)
This method reads a file from disk and outputs an atom 1.0 xml document string.

Parameters:
file - the atom xml file to be read
Returns:
an atom feed document string.

readFeedToString

public static java.lang.String readFeedToString(java.net.URL url)
This method reads an atom file from the internet and writes it out to an atom feed string.

Parameters:
url - the location of the atom file on the internet
Returns:
an atom feed document string.

readFeedString

public static java.lang.String readFeedString(java.lang.String file)
Deprecated. (use one of the readFeedToString() methods. This will be removed in the next release.)

Parameters:
file - the file path and name to be written to a string.
Returns:
an atom feed document string.

readFeedToBean

public static Feed readFeedToBean(java.lang.String xmlString)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
This method reads an xml string into a Feed bean.

Parameters:
xmlString - the xml string to be transformed into a Feed bean.
Returns:
the atom Feed bean
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the string cannot be parsed into a Feed bean.

readFeedToBean

public static Feed readFeedToBean(java.io.File file)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
This method reads an xml File object into a Feed bean.

Parameters:
file - the file object representing an atom file.
Returns:
the atom Feed bean.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the file cannot be parsed into a Feed bean.

readFeedToBean

public static Feed readFeedToBean(java.net.URL url)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
This method reads an atom file from the Internet into a Feed bean.

Parameters:
url - the internet location of an atom file.
Returns:
the atom Feed bean.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the URL cannot be parsed into a Feed bean.

readFeedDoc

public static Feed readFeedDoc(java.lang.String fileOrString,
                               boolean isFile)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
Deprecated. use one of the readFeedToBean() methods. this method will be removed in the next release.

Parameters:
fileOrString - file path or xml string
isFile - whether the fileOrString is a file
Returns:
the atom Feed bean.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the file or string cannot be parsed into a Feed bean.
